amendment.description: Amendment prohibits deriving any funds authorized in the bill from an increase in airline ticket taxes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to prohibit any of the money in the DHS authorization bill to come from an increase in airline ticket taxes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 363 - 65 (Roll no. 184).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Hooley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 363 - 65 (Roll no. 184).
